title: Essay: Persuasive Writing
description: Write a 500-word persuasive essay on a topic of your choice. Include a clear thesis statement, supporting arguments, and a conclusion.

title: Reading Response: Chapter 5
description: Submit a one-page reading response to Chapter 5 of the class novel. Address theme, character development, and your personal reaction.

title: Problem Set: Quadratic Equations
description: Complete questions 1-20 from the quadratic equations worksheet. Show all working.

title: Lab Report: Chemical Reactions
description: Write up the lab experiment from Week 3. Include hypothesis, method, results table, and conclusion.

title: Research: Industrial Revolution
description: A 3-page research piece on one aspect of the Industrial Revolution. Cite at least 3 sources.
